author: AP
title: US national soccer team's gender discrimination case delayed
description: The trial date for the U.S. women’s national soccer team’s gender discrimination case has been pushed back to June 16
content:
The trial date for a gender discrimination case filed by the U.S. women’s national soccer team has been pushed back to June 16. 
Players for the team filed a lawsuit against U.S. Soccer last year under the Equal Pay Act and the Civil Rights Act of 1964. They… [+485 chars]
